title: Currently D4 Top Main looking to join a competitve team

embed.description: MaiI / Diamond 4 23LP / 83W 58L Win Ratio 59% / Kled - 58W 36L Win Ratio 62%, Azir - 9W 8L Win Ratio 53%, Taric - 5W 1L Win Ratio 83%, Jax - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Tahm Kench - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%

body:
Currently a Diamond 4 Top laner main looking to join a competitive team to play in tournaments and expand

Im currently a diamond 4 player currently 41LP ranked at 1,150 on the leaderboard looking to join a competitve team to participate in tournaments and expand.

I've played leauge of legends since season 3 and mainly played as a toplane main since late season 6. 
S3: Bronze 1
S4: Silver 5
S5: Plat 5
S6: G1
S7: Plat 1
S8: Currently Diamond 4 

I've mostly been a kled main for this current season but don't let my matchmaking deceive you for me to be a kled one trick.
My  current strongest pocket picks for top lane are currently Kled/Nasus/Camille/Sion and jax
My Best champions for each role are:

Mid: Azir/Ekko/Yasuo/Vel Koz/ Kat 
JG: Kayn/WW/Rengar/Jax/Lee Sin
Adc: Lucian/Jhin/Twitch/Vayne/Draven/Kai'sa/Ezreal/Jinx
Support: Taric/Alistar/Bruam/Thresh

I can mostly play nearly every role confidently as i have mostly 3-4 pocket picks for each role but confidently have great game knowledge on every champion. 

If you are interested in contacting me you can message me on discord @ MaiI#0873

Or add me in game on leauge @MaiI  (Name is spelt M a i i   but the last letter spelt with a capital).

Thanks! {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
